description: [Raccoon Stealer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1148) uses HTTP, and particularly HTTP POST requests, for command and control actions.(Citation: S2W Racoon 2022)(Citation: Sekoia Raccoon1 2022)(Citation: Sekoia Raccoon2 2022)
